verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

Speak unto the children of Israel , and say unto them, When either man or woman shall separate \add themselves\add* to vow a vow of a Nazarite , to separate \add themselves\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:\f + \fr 6.2 \ft to separate…: or, to make themselves Nazarites\f*

He shall separate \add himself\add* from wine and strong drink , and shall drink no vinegar of wine , or vinegar of strong drink , neither shall he drink any liquor of grapes , nor eat moist grapes , or dried.

All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree , from the kernels even to the husk.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft separation: or, Nazariteship\f*\f + \fr 6.4 \ft vine…: Heb. vine of the wine\f*

All the days of the vow of his separation there shall no razor come upon his head : until the days be fulfilled , in the which he separateth \add himself\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he shall be holy , \add and\add* shall let the locks of the hair of his head grow.
All the days that he separateth \add himself\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he shall come at no dead body.

He shall not make himself unclean for his father , or for his mother , for his brother , or for his sister , when they die : because the consecration of his God \add is\add* upon his head.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft consecration: Heb. separation\f*
All the days of his separation he \add is\add* holy unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And if any man die very suddenly by him, and he hath defiled the head of his consecration ; then he shall shave his head in the day of his cleansing , on the seventh day shall he shave it.
And on the eighth day he shall bring two turtles , or two young pigeons , to the priest , to the door of the tabernacle of the congregation :
And the priest shall offer the one for a sin offering , and the other for a burnt offering , and make an atonement for him, for that he sinned by the dead , and shall hallow his head that same day.

And he shall consecrate unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the days of his separation , and shall bring a lamb of the first year for a trespass offering : but the days that were before shall be lost , because his separation was defiled.\f + \fr 6.12 \ft be lost: Heb. fall\f* \p
¶ And this \add is\add* the law of the Nazarite , when the days of his separation are fulfilled : he shall be brought unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation :

And he shall offer his offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, one he lamb of the first year without blemish for a burnt offering , and one ewe lamb of the first year without blemish for a sin offering , and one ram without blemish for peace offerings ,
And a basket of unleavened bread , cakes of fine flour mingled with oil , and wafers of unleavened bread anointed with oil , and their meat offering , and their drink offerings.
And the priest shall bring \add them\add* before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and shall offer his sin offering , and his burnt offering :

And he shall offer the ram \add for\add* a sacrifice of peace offerings unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with the basket of unleavened bread : the priest shall offer also his meat offering , and his drink offering.

And the Nazarite shall shave the head of his separation \add at\add* the door of the tabernacle of the congregation , and shall take the hair of the head of his separation , and put \add it\add* in the fire which \add is\add* under the sacrifice of the peace offerings.

And the priest shall take the sodden shoulder of the ram , and one unleavened cake out of the basket , and one unleavened wafer , and shall put \add them\add* upon the hands of the Nazarite , after \add the hair of\add* his separation is shaven :

And the priest shall wave them \add for\add* a wave offering before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: this \add is\add* holy for the priest , with the wave breast and heave shoulder : and after that the Nazarite may drink wine.

This \add is\add* the law of the Nazarite who hath vowed , \add and of\add* his offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for his separation , beside \add that\add* that his hand shall get : according to the vow which he vowed , so he must do after the law of his separation. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,
Speak unto Aaron and unto his sons , saying , On this wise ye shall bless the children of Israel , saying unto them,
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* bless thee, and keep thee:
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* make his face shine upon thee, and be gracious unto thee:
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* lift up his countenance upon thee, and give thee peace.
And they shall put my name upon the children of Israel ; and I will bless them.
